title: Legacy.of.Kain.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Legacy.of.Kain.Anthology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Release Info:


Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2


Year: 2001
Genre: Action / Adventure / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Crystal Dynamics
Publisher: Eidos Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: Not required


System Requirements:


Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 512 MB
Video: 32 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Free space on hard disk: 1.7 GB


Game information:

In its relentless pursuit of Kain, Raziel goes farther and farther into the past
of Nosgoth. Meeting with the shadows of a forgotten era, it is becoming increasingly
bogged down in a web of fate, prostrate in time, which says nothing about history
itself. When his mission Raziel returns to the roots, it is clear that a little
personal revenge turns into a heroic campaign, the outcome of which depends the
future of the whole world.

Repack Features:

Legacy of Kain: Soul Reaver 2
Game Version - v1.02
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers)

Legacy of Kain: Blood Omen 2


Year: 2002
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Crystal Dynamics
Publisher: Eidos Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: Not required


System Requirements:


Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: Pentium III 750 MHz
Memory: 128 MB
Video: 32 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Free space on hard disk: 2.8 GB


Game information:

Many years have passed since then, as the supreme vampire Kain led the army forever
damned creatures. Now the vampire is a real hunt. Streets and passages of the ancient
city of Nosgoth became a tomb for his family. Only a small detachment remained
faithful to the supreme ruler and fiercely resistant to forces of the Order.
And then something happened that was hoped for, and fought for what Cain awoke
from centuries of sleep. Stripped of power and many have forgotten, he experiences
only two wishes - to crush the invaders and to plunge into the madness of the bloody feast.


Repack Features:

Legacy of Kain: Blood Omen 2
Game Version - v1.02
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers) Trailer
Includes crack text from 7 Wolf
Includes crack sound from Fargus
Ability to select a combination of text and voice

Legacy of Kain: Defiance


Year: 2003
Genre: Action / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Crystal Dynamics
Publisher: Eidos Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus
Voice Language: Eng |Rus
Crack: Not required


System Requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7
Processor: 1.8 GHz
Memory: 512 MB
Video: 32 MB
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Free space on hard disk: 6.3 GB

Game information:

Legacy of Kain: Defiance - this is a stunning action adventure.
Two charismatic hero that you manage alternately - the vampire
Kain and Raziel half-demon - seek to find out why their fates are
intertwined, and that threatens their gloomy world of Nosgoth.
Intriguing plot is revealed through animated inserts with great
directing and staging. In addition to the mass spec-punches and
combinations, dark demiurges available exhaustion of the victims
of the soul and blood, the transition to the measurement of spirits
indwelling in the body and other enemies. Original puzzles require
the use of unusual abilities of the characters and the interaction
with other colorful characters. First-class three-dimensional graphics
perfectly complements this exuberant mix of spectacular battles,
mysterious puzzles and fascinating narrative


Repack Features:

Legacy of Kain: Defiance
Version of the game - v1.1
Do not recoded
Cut Credits (titers developers)
Includes crack sound for movies from Kudos / Siberian Studio
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
